message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you the chance to purchase a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you.  While I can't disclose specifics just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,200,000 to you.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000, giving you a significant advantage. This is a one-time offer, so please consider it carefully. Let me know your decision.
